name: Mega My Marry Me Memories
description:
You're a wedding celebrant! You must fulfil your sacred duty of remembering the couple's names, what song they want to walk down the aisle to, and where you've kept that dang ring.

The controls are the 1, 2, 3 and 4 keys. That's all!

@customcosy and I made this game for Global Game Jam '16.
